name: 韓國文化與現代生活
description: 本課程關於當代韓國文化與生活進行理解。
goals: 了解韓國傳統文化的形成過程與韓國文化特色。
了解韓國文化政策與當代大眾文化的流行過程，有助於學生畢業後從事文化相關工作。
了解當代韓國社會所面臨的問題。
syllabus:
1st week: Course Introduction – What is Korean culture?

2nd week: (a) historical view of establishment of K-culture

3rd week: Origin of K-Idols(80’s)

4th week: Expansion of K-Idols(90’s)

5th week: The establishment of K-POP(after 00’s)

6th week: Movie(1) - The age of cinephiles(so-called ‘hollywood kid’)

7th week: Movie(2) - The rise of the new wave directors after 00’s

8th week: Musical – From <Line 1> to <The goddess is watching>

9th week: Mid-term exam

10th week: Animation – Pororo and friends

11th week: Webtoon – Internet as a new canvas

12th week: Mediamix – Transplantation of a story

13th week: Modern arts – Place of discourses

14th week: Games – the top of cultural exports

15th week: Character industry – What gives life to a thing

16th week: Welcome to the world of Korean youtuber

17th week: Korean culture as a hybrid

18th week: Final exam

methodologies.note: Slideshow presentations including video will be provided
